mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone) values (#{user_email}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where user_email = #{user_email} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
select user_pw from tbl_user where user_email = #{user_email}
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_room_review order by room_review_num desc) a) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5;
